titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 589) providing for the public release of certain documents, records, and communications related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein.
Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 589) providing for the public release of certain documents, records, and communications related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-209, by Mr. Scott, Austin.
The resolution provides that H.Res. 589 is hereby adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 39.
